content: *note this is the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern at theturtletrunk com and the turtle trunk youtube channel this listing is for a pdf digital download not a finished item the checkered dish set includes 3 crochet patterns a dishcloth towel and hanging towel they each have a fun texture that s easy to create and a cool checkered design difficulty advanced beginner finished sizes dishcloth -8 x 8 dish towel - 9 5 x 20 hanging towel - 8 x 14 supplies needed medium 4 weight cotton yarn i used dishie 5 00mm h crochet hook yarn needle scissors and 1 toggle button for the hanging towel pattern language - english written in standard us terminology my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern
